bio:
Our Sr Data Scientist and owner, began programming in 1982 and is an expert in Microsoft Visual Basic (VB.NET) and Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) which is built into all MS Office products.  He has developed projects for National financial institutions, the Department of Defense, large construction companies, and for common household appliance brands. With his leadership and supervision each project is in solid hands.

Our small team of experienced developers is focused on developing custom applications for small to medium sized businesses. Our experience and focus on this market segment allows us to support the special needs of small to medium size projects that are most often needed by entrepreneurs, small business owners/managers and department heads needing something for their department.

As a team, our primary emphasis has been on two areas (VB.NET and MS ACCESS Development using SQL).  MS ACCESS projects allow the support of rapid development and provide a user friendly environment allowing the user to create customer reports at any time.  Our team develops multi user MS Access projects using advanced levels of VBA/SQL.  We also develop large web based systems using VB/ASP.NET/SQL/AJAX which are often housed on a IIS Web server and SQL Server allowing for strong security and rapid multi user access and data manipulation. 

Our teams strong small business/start-up and management level business experience, often allows us an advantage in development as we better understand the importance of creating graphic user interfaces (GUIs) that are customized to the users role, often giving the staff a much better interaction experience.

We prefer to have as much understanding of your business and intended use for the code as we have found that to be the single biggest variable in knocking it out of the park for our customers. It is easier to perform at peak levels when we understand why and how something will be used. We provide all clients direct contact with the development team through phone, SKYPE, text, and email to ensure positive communication.  We keep our proposed deadlines and believe it is important to complete each job as promised.  Your satisfaction is always the most important thing to us.

abstrac: Excellent Codes & Designs with unsurpassed customer service!
bio:
Introduction

Dear Prospective Client (Guru)

VISYS Web studio is a global technology service company committed to provide high quality IT solutions. VISYS provides specialized consulting services that drive measureable results for both corporate and individuals. Our offices are based out of India and we have a team of highly trained IT specialists to handle your job.We provide offshore software development services on fixed cost or hourly billing basis. We have skilled resources in several technologies like .Net, SharePoint, Java, iPhone, Android and PHP. We also offer SEO, Content and Web Designing Services.

Our web developers are far more experienced in every concept of Web Development like as customizing themes, managing contents or customizing and installing dedicated plug-in adequately required by your site. We provide the very Best Web design services & the most dynamic SEO available anywhere on the internet.

Payment Terms: 

Guru Safepay Escrow, 50% deposit and rest after completion & as per milestones.
